Vehicle Class.description: The category to which the vehicle belongs

Engine Size(L).description: The size of the engine in liters

Cylinders.description: The number of cylinders in the engine

Transmission.description: The type of transmission in the vehicle

Fuel Type.description: The type of fuel the vehicle uses

Fuel Consumption City (L/100 km).description: The fuel consumption in city driving (liters per 100 kilometers)

Fuel Consumption Hwy (L/100 km).description: The fuel consumption in highway driving (liters per 100 kilometers)

Fuel Consumption Comb (L/100 km).description: The combined fuel consumption (city and highway) (liters per 100 kilometers)

Fuel Consumption Comb (mpg).description: The combined fuel consumption (city and highway) (miles per gallon)

CO2 Emissions(g/km).description: The CO2 emissions of the vehicle (grams per kilometer)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in environmental science.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the vehicle, please predict the CO2 emissions in grams per kilometer.
prompt.answer_prompt: The CO2 emissions in grams per kilometer is:.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automotive engineering.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the vehicle, please predict the combined fuel consumption in miles per gallon.
prompt.answer_prompt: The combined fuel consumption in miles per gallon is:.
